channel.title: Home on iambaangkok.me | portfolio
channel.description: Recent content in Home on iambaangkok.me | portfolio

item.title: RootAI
item.description: A non-neural network artificial intelligence ( AI ) system that is capable of playing the boardgame ‘Root.’

item.title: Coolant! - Playable in Browser
item.description: An arena shooter game where you must keep the reactor alive by collecting coolants around the arena while surviving the invasion of lava slimes.

item.title: C.A.R.E.N.
item.description: A battle simulator between antiviruses and viruses.

item.title: Not-Tamagotchi
item.description: A simple virtual pet simulator that will accompany you while you work on other things in your computer.

item.title: Savior of Nature
item.description: A 3D open-world, third-person RPG game where you must complete quests, level-up and protect planet Tierra from environmental collapse caused by humans.
